description: The perfect travel shirt, this short-sleeved shirt in a classic Fjällräven design will keep you cool no matter how hot it is. Made from our G-1000 Air Stretch that is light, airy, durable and extremely comfortable thanks to its polyester/cotton blend and mechanical stretch. Button-down collar and two chest pockets with buttoned flaps, one with a pen opening. Fold-up sleeves and a box pleat at the back for extra comfort and freedom of movement. Leather logo on left sleeve.
name: Fjallraven Ovik Air Stretch SS Shirt - Mens
